description: Are you seeing ice, sleet or snow in your area?
title: Snow in metro Atlanta: Share your #ATLsnow photos
title_page: Snow in metro Atlanta: Share your #ATLsnow photos
text:
Are you seeing ice, sleet or snow in your area? If you can do so safely, show and tell us about it using #ATLsnow on Twitter and Instagram, or by uploading an image to this page .
Snow is already falling in some of the 50 counties under a winter storm warning through 10 a.m. Thursday. Gov. Nathan Deal declared a state of emergency for disaster preparedness starting at 2 p.m. Forecasters warn that the system could bring accumulations from around 2 inches in metro Atlanta to upwards of 6 inches in the mountain counties. Read more of our weather coverage and updates here .
